column17:
Perry Ellis Reserve Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.1853

She’s the quiet girl who reads alone at the downtown coffee shop - radiating a serene and cerebral quality. A woman of today with an endearing shyness she masks more than she reveals just like a whiff of Perry Ellis Reserve. Created by Jean-Louis Grauby this enchanting Eau De Parfum is made for the established house of Perry Ellis.

Zesty notes of ginger along with rich hints of sandalwood earthy hints of patchouli peppery and refreshing extracts of freesia powdery flecks of violet organic notes of oakmoss intense and sweet hints of rose hay-toned marigold and warming notes of chamomile. The intoxicating array of aromatic extracts ensure that this oriental floral fragrance is perfect for that night you’ve been waiting for. This fragrance comes in a slender cylindrical flacon that radiates a pale green hue of pistachio. A transparent spherical stopper of this fragrance acts as the simple finishing touch. A spritz of this scent and embrace everything life has to offer.

column17:
Perry Ellis 360 Red Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2899

With 360 Red for Women the fashion house of Perry Ellis presents a fragrance inspired by warm beaches and all that is quintessential about the American way of life. This luxury perfume enthralls your senses with the zest of fresh flowers and is classy and playful at the same time. Always refreshing always contemporary this Eau de Perfume is emblematic of sensual spirited femininity - uninhibited and irresistible.

This luxuriously modern elixir opens with a top note of sparkling orange leaf and accords of plum and cyclamen. The ultra-feminine heart note comprises of orange flower mimosa dewy Hawaiian orchid and the sheer essence of jasmine. The mellifluous base note weaves a chord of joy around your senses with accords of wood amber and velvety musk. Perfect for that special romantic date 360 Red for Women energizes with its essence of vitality and sheer sensuality.

column17:
Perry Ellis F Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2113

Audacious and playful Perry Ellis F is a fragrance that captures the succulent simplicity of youth and sends you into a tailspin of floral bliss. For the woman who embraces the random moments of fun which are scattered throughout her existence the mass premium provides the perfect stage to showcase her innate and pervasive capability of being happy. She is neither naive not cunning; she is the perfect balance between sensuously feminine and innocently child-like. This Eau de Parfum from Perry Ellis accentuates her individuality.

Launched in 2004 the piquant fragrance opens to the pulsing floral beat of lily ivy and rose. The heart notes float on accords of gardenia and pink peony while they slowly yet surely trail into a dry down created by expertly blended accords of soothing sandalwood spicy cinnamon and powdery musk. Captured in a tall flacon with pink accents which moulds the dishy pink essence within well the fragrance is the signature of a woman who knows how to enthrall. Let go of inhibitions live in the moment and find the delightful fun that is stowed away in the deep crevasse of your heart with Perry Ellis F.
